00038 class Snortips extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'snortips';
00041     public $User= 'root';
00042 
00043     private $sigMsgFile= '/var/tmp/snortips.sigmsg';
00044 
00045     public $NVPS= '\h';
00046     public $ConfFile= '/etc/snort/snortips.conf';
00047     public $LogFile= '/var/log/snortips.log';

00053     function Snortips()
00054     {
00055         global $TmpFile;
00056         
00057         parent::Model();
00058         
00059         $this->StartCmd= "unset LC_ALL; unset LANG; /usr/local/sbin/snortips > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00060 
00061         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00062             $this->Commands,
00063             array(
00064                 'AddIPToList'   => array(
00065                     'argv'  => array(NAME, IPADR|IPRANGE),
00066                     'desc'  => _('Add to IP list'),
00067                     ),
00068 
00069                 'DelIPFromList' => array(
00070                     'argv'  => array(NAME, SERIALARRAY),
00071                     'desc'  => _('Delete IP from list'),
00072                     ),
00073 
00074                 'UnblockAll'    => array(
00075                     'argv'  => array(),
00076                     'desc'  => _('Unblock all'),
00077                     ),
00078 
00079                 'UnblockIPs'    => array(
00080                     'argv'  => array(SERIALARRAY),
00081                     'desc'  => _('Unblock IPs'),
00082                     ),
00083 
00084                 'BlockIP'   => array(
00085                     'argv'  => array(IPADR|IPRANGE, NUM|EMPTYSTR),
00086                     'desc'  => _('Block IPs'),
00087                     ),
00088 
00089                 'GetInfo'   => array(
00090                     'argv'  => array(),
00091                     'desc'  => _('Get IPS info'),
00092                     ),
00093 
00094                 'GetListIPs'    => array(
00095                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00096                     'desc'  => _('Get listed ips'),
00097                     ),
00098 
00099                 'GetKeywords'   => array(
00100                     'argv'  => array(),
00101                     'desc'  => _('Get alert keywords'),
00102                     ),
00103 
00104                 'AddKeyword'    => array(
00106                     'argv'  => array(STR),
00107                     'desc'  => _('Add alert keyword'),
00108                     ),
00109 
00110                 'DelKeyword'    => array(
00111                     'argv'  => array(STR),
00112                     'desc'  => _('Delete alert keywords'),
00113                     ),
00114             )
00115         );
00116     }

00118     function Stop()
00119     {
00120         return $this->Kill();
00121     }
00122     
00128     function GetIP($ip)
00129     {
00130         $ip= Escape($ip, '/.');
00131         return $this->SearchFile($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*($ip)\b\h*$/m");
00132     }
00133 
00134     function GetInfo()
00135     {
00136         global $Re_Ip, $Re_Net;
00137 
00138         // Clear the file if this function spawns too fast (do not read the same contents again)
00139         $this->PutFile('/var/db/snortips', '');
00140         
00141         if ($this->IsRunning()) {
00142             $this->RunShellCommand('/bin/kill -INFO $(/bin/cat /var/run/snortips.pid)');
00143             
00145             $eof= FALSE;
00146             $count= 0;
00147             while ($count++ < self::PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT) {
00148                 if ($items= $this->GetFile('/var/db/snortips')) {
00149                     // Check for EOF
00150                     if (preg_match("/^\.$/m", $items)) {
00151                         $eof= TRUE;
00152                         break;
00153                     }
00154                 }
00155                 exec('/bin/sleep .1');
00156             }
00157             
00158             if ($eof) {
00159                 $info= array(
00160                     'Whitelisted' => array(),
00161                     'Blocked' => array(),
00162                     'Blacklisted' => array(),
00163                     );
00164 
00165                 $items= explode("\n", $items);
00166                 foreach ($items as $line) {
00167                     if (preg_match("/^($Re_Net|$Re_Ip) \((\d+)\)$/", $line, $match)) {
00168                         $host= $match[1];
00169                         $expires= $match[2];
00170                         $info['Blocked'][$host]= $expires.' ('. floor($expires / 60) .' '._('min').' '. $expires % 60 .' '._('sec').')';
00171                     }
00172                     else if (preg_match("/^!($Re_Net|$Re_Ip)/", $line, $match)) {
00173                         $info['Whitelisted'][]= $match[1];
00174                     }
00175                     else if (preg_match("/^($Re_Net|$Re_Ip)/", $line)) {
00176                         $info['Blacklisted'][]= $line;
00177                     }
00178                 }
00179                 return serialize($info);
00180             }
00181         }
00182         return FALSE;
00183     }
00184 
00192     function DelIPFromList($list, $ips)
00193     {
00194         $systemips[]= '127.0.0.1';
00195         if ($list == 'whitelist') {
00196             $ifs= explode("\n", $this->GetPhyIfs());
00197             foreach ($ifs as $if) {
00198                 if ($ifip= $this->GetIpAddr($if)) {
00199                     $systemips[]= $ifip;
00200                 }
00201             }
00202         }
00203 
00204         $ips= unserialize($ips);
00205         $retval= TRUE;
00206         foreach ($ips as $ip) {
00207             if (!in_array($ip, $systemips)) {
00208                 $method= $list == 'whitelist' ? 'DelAllowedIp' : 'DelRestrictedIp';
00209                 $retval&= $this->$method($ip);
00210             }
00211             else {
00212                 ViewError(_('You cannot delete system IP address').": $ip");
00213                 $retval= FALSE;
00214             }
00215         }
00216         return $retval;
00217     }
00218 
00224     function AddIPToList($list, $ip)
00225     {
00226         global $preIP, $preNet;
00227 
00229         $compip= $list == 'whitelist' ? $ip : "!$ip";
00230         
00231         $output= $this->GetIP($compip);
00232         if ($output !== $compip) {
00233             $output= $this->RunShellCommand("/sbin/pfctl -nv -t snortips -T add $ip 2>&1");
00234             $output= explode("\n", $output);
00235             // 0/1 addresses added (dummy).
00236             if (preg_match('/^(\d+)\/\d+ addresses added \(dummy\)\.$/', $output[0], $match)) {
00237                 if ($match[1] > 0) {
00238                     if (preg_match("/^A\s+($preIP|$preNet)$/", $output[1], $match)) {
00239                         $actualadded= $match[1];
00240                         // 192.168.1.1/32 and 192.168.1.1 are identical, but we miss it above
00241                         $compip= $list == 'whitelist' ? $actualadded : "!$actualadded";
00242                         $output= $this->GetIP($compip);
00243                         if ($output !== $compip) {
00244                             $method= $list == 'whitelist' ? 'AddAllowedIp' : 'AddRestrictedIp';
00245                             $retval= $this->$method($actualadded);
00246                             if ($actualadded == $ip) {
00247                                 return $retval;
00248                             }
00249                             ViewError(_('IP or network address fixed').": $ip -> $actualadded");
00250                         }
00251                         else {
00252                             ViewError(_('White and black list entries should not be identical').": $actualadded");
00253                         }
00254                     }
00255                 }
00256                 else {
00257                     ViewError(_('Cannot add').": $ip\n$output[0]");
00258                 }
00259             }
00260             else {
00261                 ViewError(_('Pfctl output does not match').": $ip\n$output[0]");
00262             }
00263         }
00264         else {
00265             ViewError(_('White and black list entries should not be identical').": $ip");
00266         }
00267         return FALSE;
00268     }
00269 
00272     function UnblockAll()
00273     {
00274         return $this->RunShellCommand('/bin/kill -USR2 $(/bin/cat /var/run/snortips.pid)');
00275     }
00276 
00279     function UnblockIPs($ips)
00280     {
00281         $ips= unserialize($ips);
00282         $contents= array();
00283         foreach ($ips as $ip) {
00284             $contents[]= "U $ip\n";
00285         }
00286         // file_put_contents() accepts array as data
00287         file_put_contents($this->sigMsgFile, $contents, LOCK_EX);
00288         return $this->RunShellCommand('/bin/kill -USR1 $(/bin/cat /var/run/snortips.pid)');
00289     }
00290 
00293     function BlockIP($ip, $time= '')
00294     {
00295         file_put_contents($this->sigMsgFile, rtrim("B $ip $time"), LOCK_EX);
00296         return $this->RunShellCommand('/bin/kill -USR1 $(/bin/cat /var/run/snortips.pid)');
00297     }
00298 
00301     function GetListIPs($list)
00302     {
00303         global $Re_Ip, $Re_Net;
00304         
00305         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->LISTS[$list], "/^\h*($Re_Ip|$Re_Net)\h*$/m");
00306     }
00307 
00310     function GetKeywords()
00311     {
00312         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*Keyword\h+\"(.*)\"\h*$/m");
00313     }
00314     
00317     function AddKeyword($keyword)
00318     {
00319         $this->DelKeyword($keyword);
00320         return $this->AppendToFile($this->ConfFile, "Keyword \"$keyword\"");
00321     }
00322 
00325     function DelKeyword($keyword)
00326     {
00327         $keyword= Escape($keyword, '/');
00328         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*Keyword\h+\"$keyword\"\s*)/m", '');
00329     }
00330 
00336     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00337     {
00338         global $Re_Ip, $Re_Net;
00339 
00340         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00341             // Unblocking host 10.0.1.13
00342             $re= "/^Unblocking host ($Re_Ip|$Re_Net)$/";
00343             if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00344                 $cols['Unblocking']= $match[1];
00345             }
00346             else {
00347                 // Blocking host $host as blacklisted
00348                 $re= "/^Blocking host ($Re_Ip|$Re_Net) as blacklisted$/";
00349                 if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00350                     $cols['Blocked']= $match[1];
00351                 }
00352                 else {
00353                     // Host $host is already blocked; blocking as blacklisted
00354                     $re= "/^Host ($Re_Ip|$Re_Net) is already blocked; blocking as blacklisted$/";
00355                     if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00356                         $cols['Blocked']= $match[1];
00357                     }
00358                     else {
00359                         // Blocking host 11.11.11.12 for 3600 ticks
00360                         $re= "/^Blocking host ($Re_Ip|$Re_Net) for (\d+) ticks$/";
00361                         if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00362                             $cols['Blocked']= $match[1];
00363                             $cols['BlockedTime']= $match[2];
00364                         }
00365                         else {
00366                             // Host 11.11.11.11 is already blocked; extending amnesty to 7200 ticks
00367                             $re= "/^Host ($Re_Ip|$Re_Net) is already blocked; extending block duration by (\d+) ticks$/";
00368                             if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00369                                 $cols['Extended']= $match[1];
00370                                 $cols['ExtendedTime']= $match[2];
00371                             }
00372                             else {
00373                                 // Soft init requested, unblocking and zeroing all
00374                                 $re= "/^Soft init requested, unblocking and zeroing all$/";
00375                                 if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00376                                     $cols['Softinit']= $cols['Date'].' - '.substr($cols['Time'], 0, 2)._('h');
00377                                 }
00378                             }
00379                         }
00380                     }
00381                 }
00382             }
00383             return TRUE;
00384         }
00385         return FALSE;
00386     }
00387 }
